thoughts.text: I am not sure if faster than light travel is possible, but I can try to find ways to shorten the time it takes to travel to the center of the Milky Way. I think I should start by researching the fastest spacecrafts and propulsion systems currently available. Maybe I can also try to find shortcuts or gravitational assists that can help reduce travel time. I will need to do more research to come up with a solid plan.
thoughts.reasoning: Faster than light travel may not be possible, but there are still ways to reduce travel time.
thoughts.plan:
- Research the fastest spacecrafts and propulsion systems currently available
- Look for shortcuts or gravitational assists that can help reduce travel time
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to get too caught up in the idea of faster than light travel and instead focus on more realistic solutions.
thoughts.speak: I will start by researching the fastest spacecrafts and propulsion systems currently available and looking for shortcuts or gravitational assists that can help reduce travel time.

args.query: fastest spacecrafts and propulsion systems for interstellar travel
